items.name: content
items.description: Content of the control; this property has any number of >item< XML elements as its children, with the items text as their text values (see below; default: empty).

type.name: EVT_CHECKLISTBOX
type.description: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_CHECKLISTBOX_TOGGLED event, when an item in the check list box is checked or unchecked. wxCommandEvent::GetInt() will contain the index of the item that was checked or unchecked. wxCommandEvent::IsChecked() is not valid! Use wxCheckListBox::IsChecked() instead.
